version_description: - Fix crash on startup on iOS 5

- Bug fixes
- Removed video advertising
- Disable AC3 codec due to legal issues

***Total downloader 2.0 has been rewritten from ground up with iOS 7 in mind! (it works perfectly on iOS 6 also).

***Thanks to new iOS 7 features it's now possible to downloads big files while the app remain in background

***Also you can now

- Extract audio tracks from videos!
- Ringtone creator feature, starting from mp3 files
- External screen support with cable or airplay
- Landscape view on iPhone
- Supports password protected Zip & Rar files
- Fewer advertising spaces

Also this time we're delivering a lot of value whit this update!

**** Now you can link your dropbox, gdrive and skydrive accounts (also more than one for each provider)!! ****

- You can create mixed playlists with local and cloud elements
Bug Fix
- Fixed rotation issue on iPad with iOS 8.1

- Fixed link detection on some sites
- Added a confirmation popup when a site try to redirect to App Store

- Updated for 64 bit architecture
- Restored notification on download completion
- Bug fix and performance improvements

2.6.1:

- Fixed dropbox login
- Improved compatibility with iOS 9.0
- Bug fix and perfomance improvements

Totally redesigned!

- iOS 11 Files App integration
- PDF reader with annotation support
- Virtual Folders to collect local and cloud-saved files
- New Multi-tab browser
- Spotlight indexing of all app contents, with real time index upda

- Added support for iOS 13 dark mode
- Bug fix & performance improvements

This is a Major update especially for iPadOS users: we introduced multi windows support so that you can now open two or more windows of Total Files and drag files between them and other apps!

Other new features:
- Thumbnails are now shown for mo

This is a Major update especially for iPadOS users: we introduced multi windows support so that you can now open two or more windows of Total Files and drag files between them and other apps!
